name: AbnormalUterineOrVaginalBleedingDisorders
title: Abnormal Uterine or Vaginal Bleeding Disorders
description: This value set has not yet been tested and validated in a clinical setting. Please use with caution.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Abnormal uterine or vaginal bleeding disorders (i.e., conditions) that are noted outside of "normal" menstrual bleeding.),(Data Element Scope: This value set was developed to identify evidence of abnormal uterine/vaginal bleeding disorders (e.g., spotting/bleeding between menstrual periods, after sex, or after menopause. Also menstrual periods lasting longer than 7 days, and excessively heavy menstrual bleeding).),(Inclusion Criteria: Abnormal uterine and/or vaginal bleeding ICD10CM codes),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes representing "normal" menstruation, pregnancy-related bleeding, and codes that convey the rationale for the abnormal bleeding (since the purpose of this value set is to prompt a diagnostic work up to evaluate abnormal bleeding). For example, abnormal uterine bleeding due to submucous uterine fibriod.)

contains.display: Excessive and frequent menstruation with regular cycle
Excessive and frequent menstruation with irregular cycle
Excessive bleeding in the premenopausal period
Other abnormal uterine and vaginal bleeding
Other specified abnormal uterine and vaginal bleeding
Abnormal uterine and vaginal bleeding, unspecified
